thread.title: Nancy Fellows

author: Nancy Fellows
title: Nancy Fellows
text:
I ordered this blind in the sale so it was an absolute bargain. Having used blind fitting companies in the past I was concerned that I would measure wrongly or the blind would be really difficult to fit myself but there are easy to follow instructions for measuring and installing. It was very very easy. I am very pleased with the blind and it was about a third of the price I would have paid with my usual blind company.
Definitely recommend Blinds 2go
